queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{envoy}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{envoy}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{envoy-initconfig}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{envoy-initconfig}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{shutdown-manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{shutdown-manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.rules[3] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.rules[3] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is true

queries.description: Service has an external load balancer, which may cause accessibility from other networks and the Internet

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}} using an external Load Balancer provider by cloud provider
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}} is exposing a workload, not using an external Load Balancer provider by cloud provider

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{envoy}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{envoy}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{contour}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{envoy-initconfig}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{envoy-initconfig}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{shutdown-manager}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{shutdown-manager}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{contour}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{contour}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{contour}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{contour}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{envoy-initconfig}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{envoy-initconfig}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{envoy}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{envoy}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{shutdown-manager}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{shutdown-manager}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour-certgen}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-contour}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-contour-envoy}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
